summary: Created page with "'''Michael Savage''' is an American conservative talk radio host who has infrequently appeared on [[InfoWars]] as a guest. Savage has a different brand than [[Alex Jones]]]], but has pushed some very hardcore stuff, including [[Covid-19]] denial-ism and a bunch of [[Great Replacement Theory]]-style racism.   Savage likes to skirt the line of pretending to be a doctor, but it's worth noting that his most relevant degree is in "nutritional ethnomedicine". He's consistently..."
